posts.author: Kalistez
posts.content:
Hi all,

 
have a new challenge for the brilliant minds that inhabit these forums. 

I recently ventured back to a server I used to play on and found that they have implemented a 'Rebirth System' This essentially means that twice you can be stripped of all XP and granted a bonus based on what your previous build was. 

More info can be found here http://legionofrhun.freeforums.org/legi ... t1779.html

I was considering a ITWF, ED F/R/? for the final build, something along the lines of 

-Griz's Rogue of War http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 06501.html 
or 
-Micks Halfling Champion. http://nwnecbguild.forumer.com/topic/23 ... Us4y_mqpBc  

For my first rebirth I need a build with 30SD Levels and SC5, this will give me a permanent 65% Concealment and + Natural AC.  For this I was going to take  
-Syrath's Iconic Shadowdancer http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 53573.html and drop 2 of the fighter levels for the 2 extra SD levels.  

For my second rebirth I need a build  with either 30Wiz Levels and 30 Base Int which will give me a permanent 50% SR and immunity to all spells 5th level and below.  For this I was going to slightly modify 
-Griz's War Wizard http://home.comcast.net/~worldofgreyhaw ... 31822.html 
or
a build with 25 Ranger Levels and 30 Base Dex which will give me +5 AB on each weapon and +15 Deflection AC to my off hand.  I haven't really looked at a build for this.  


The main things to remember are that it is a stripping of xp, not a reroll so Race, Class, Stats and first level feat(s) need to be the same for each build.  I was going to use Rogue.  

Also it is a high magic world (+10) with lots of +ele dmg available via scrolls or forging so WS/EWS is not as crucial as it usually is for dex builds.   Race is not important as XP is pretty easy to come by but Elf would be preferred.  

I realise this is a big ask but I thought it might add a bit of a fresh approach to the building process.   


Thanks in Advance !

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey Kal!

I was wondering what exactly is it that you want from us? Do you want us to build you a Rogue Fighter CoT?

I have a very good high AB dex-based build you should also look at. It's called Drow Fencer, which is incidentally an Elf as well. It reaches an unbuffed AB of 47.

However, if you want something along the lines of Mick's or Grizz's builds, I would advise the optimal spread of Rogue 16 / CoT 14 / Fighter 10 or if you think the saves are more important than the feat (which they probably are) Rogue 16 / Fighter 6 / CoT 18. Pre-epic you can go Fighter 6 Cot 10 Rogue 4 and drop 1 BAB for loads of pre-epic feats or go Rogue 8 Fighter 5 CoT 7, which would save you three feats to take in Epics, so you'll have FTR 6 for EWF, COT 8 for AS, COT 10 for EP, COT 14 for EWS AND COT 18 for maybe Epic Fortitude, plus you'll get a much earlier Epic Dodge in this setup cuz all your general epic feats can be Great Dexterities.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Kalistez
posts.content:
Hi Max,

Essentially I am looking for 3 builds that are identical at level 1. (Race, Class, Stats, Feats)

The first is a Ranger 25/Rogue?/? with 30 Dex

The second is a Shadowdancer30/Rogue?/? with SC5

And the third a ITWF, ED Fighter?/Rogue?/?? (probably either WM or COT)

The way it works is you level the first and get to a certain point in the main quest and can get dropped back to level 1 but gain a +5 AB on each hand and +15 Deflection AC for 20mins/3x a day

Then you do the same again but this time you gain a 65% concealment and +5 Natural AC for 20mins/3x a day

The you level the third build which in addition to being a ITWF, ED F/R/? also has 65% Concealment, +20 AC and +5AB on each hand for 20mins/3x a day

I forgot to mention that RDD and PM can only be taken in the third build (Not really applicable here but I'll just put it out there anyway)

Thanks !
